text: Bishwanath Ghosh is a Bangladeshi footballer who plays as a defender. He currently plays for Sheikh Russel KC. == International career == On 4 September 2018, Bishwanath made his senior career debut against Bhutan during 2018 SAFF Championship.https://www.dhakatribune.com/sport/football/2018/09/07/bishwanath- rekindles-tradition-of-long-throw-in ==International goals== ===Youth=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! Competition |- | || 8 November 2017 || Central Stadium, Hisor || Sri Lanka U19 || || || 2018 AFC U-19 Championship qualification |} ==Personal life== Bishwanath married his childhood girlfriend Chaity Ghosh in January 2020 during 2020 Bangabandhu Cup. He took a three-hour break from his head coach for that. From religious views, Bishwanath is a follower of Hinduism. == References == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi footballers Category:Bangladesh international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Footballers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Bangladesh
title: Bishwanath Ghosh (footballer)
